pullRequest.title: ReturnRequestIdHeaderInterceptor
pullRequest.bodyText:
to request server put x-ms-client-request-id in response
Sample usage:
        Azure azure = Azure.configure()
                .withInterceptor(new ReturnRequestIdHeaderInterceptor())
                .authenticate(...)
                ...

Header can be accessed in Exception.
        exception.response().headers().get("x-ms-client-request-id")

commit.message: ReturnRequestIdHeaderInterceptor to request server put x-ms-client-request-id in response

nodes.bodyText: Might better default true or just remove this boolean.

commit.message: improve doc, use enum for readability
